google_compute_instance_group.description: Manages an Instance Group within GCE.

name.description: The name which the port will be mapped to.

zone.description: The zone that this instance group should be created in.

description.description: An optional textual description of the instance

instances.description: List of instances in the group. They should be given

named_port.description: The named port configuration. See the section below

project.description: The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it

network.description: The URL of the network the instance group is in. If

port.description: The port number to map the name to.

self_link.description: The URI of the created resource.

size.description: The number of instances in the group.
